programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp shows how forgotten furniture can be liberated from landfill, as she teams up with furniture maker Simon Bell to revive an old dining room chair.
John and Julia are desperate to escape the cold British winters. Sara Damergi shows them what their £100,000 budget can buy in the Orihuela Costa area of Spain's Costa Blanca.

programme.desc: Sandra is convinced that now is the time to buy her dream holiday pad in Torrevieja on Spain's Costa Blanca. Sara Damergi shows her a selection of properties for £45,000 or less.

programme.desc: Henry Cole and Max McMurdo restore and upcycle 2CV headlamps, a child's rocking horse, a Victorian streetlamp and a high chair. (S2 Ep12/25)

Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts at Swallows Rest in Weymouth, Dorset, where owners Jane and Keith Smith are pulling out all the stops to win, but some of the feedback leaves Jane white as a sheet.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: The third visit this week is to Hotel Montville in Redditch, Worcestershire, where host Ray Chowdhury hopes to win over his rival B&B owners with his unique style and decor.
programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: The last visit of the week is to The Silverton in Shrewsbury, where business partners Donna and David offer complimentary earplugs, but some guests are concerned about road noise.

programme.desc: It's the last day of the competition and tensions are running high. Donna and David take umbrage with Jane and Keith, and accusations fly around the table before the winner is announced.
